Description of incident: "WordPress hosting outfit WP Engine has confessed to a security breach, prompting it to reset 30,000 customers' passwords."At WP Engine we are committed to providing robust security. We are writing today to let you know that we learned of an exposure involving some of our customers’ credentials," it said in a statement yesterday."Out of an abundance of caution, we are proactively taking security measures across our entire customer base," it added."
